title: Isa
content: Is 27-28 a good score in isa?

comments.body: lmao that's below class avg, anything below 39 is bad
please bro, the kid will kill himself if he believes you

If they are kind enough yes 
If they want to screw you over no
if you're happy with a 8-8.5 gpa then yes 27-28 is a good score
Get  27-30 in every subject or more less somewhere up and somewhere down that's fine try maintaining that region
Mostly no, math was never really relative
Do we have to write backlogs exam if we fail in isa
there is no failing in isa
Sorry it is ESA not isa
